pages.title: Ball Python
pages.text: The ball python ($(o)Python regius$()), also called the royal python, is a python species native to West and Central Africa, where it lives in grasslands, shrublands and open forests.$(br2)This nonvenomous constrictor is the smallest of the African pythons, growing to a maximum length of 182 cm ($(o)72 in).

pages.title: Ball Python
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
